title: Blackguards.Deluxe.Edition.MULTi11-PLAZA
description:
P-R-E-S-E-N-T-S



Blackguards Deluxe Edition (c) Daedalic



Date ....................................................... July.2014

Size ............................................................ 1xCD

Languages ...................... EN/FR/DE/CZ/PL/ES/JAP/KOR/RUS/POR/ITA

Protection ..................................................... Steam



Includes Blackguards, Untold Legends DLC, PLUS Artbook with ~150

pages, Soundtrack, digital World Map, Developer Interview Videos

and 6 Exclusive Wallpapers



This pack includes the latest game updates aswell

Change to your desired language in game menu



1. Extract release

2. Mount ISO

3. Install the game

4. copy crack from PLAZA dir to install dir

5. Play!
